description: Presidential Secretariat - Approval of Relinquishment of the position of the chief of Defence Staff and Retirement from Sri Lanka Air Force of Air Chief Marshal Roshan Goonathilake RWP, VSV, USP, ndc, psc - Relinquishment of the position of the Head of Sri Lanka Army and Appointment of the position of Chief of Defence Staff of General Jagath Jayasuriya - Promotion to the rank of Lieutenant General and Appointment to the Head of the Sri Lanka Army of Major General R. M. Dayaratna Ratnayake RWP, VSV, USP, ndc, psc
